msg: - Added some explanations to the tutorial examples.
- Made the ezcAuthentication options property as protected, to accomodate

msg: - Added package tags, so that this is part of the documentation.

author: as:ez.no
msg: - Added modes of grouping the filters in the Group filter:
OR:  At least one filter needs to succeed for the group to succeed.
AND: All filters need to succeed for the group to succeed.

author: as:ez.no
msg: - Added possibility of defining the session keys used by the session filter.
